|fccapprovdate = 11/13/2006 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Appears to be the wireless module of some HP and Samsung printers. :HP P/N {{HP PN|1150-7924}} / RSVLD-0608 ([[Foxconn]] / Hon Hai) *'''Foxconn U98H035''' (HP) / [[HP RSVLD-0608 (1150-7924)]] This device appears to be using the ''[[Broadcom]]'' BCM94326USBGP reference design. {{see also|HP RSVLD-0506 (1150-7910)|HP SDGOB-0991 (1150-7933)}} ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.betaarchive.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=19403 On '''betaarchive.com''' forums] :Identifies in Windows as a ''802.11b/g LP/SC USBeless Adapter'' :0a5c:bd12 USB ID (BCM94326USBGP) *[https://electronics.stackexchange.com/questions/94244/how-to-connect-a-printer-wifi-module-wires-to-an-arduino/94246 ''How to connect a Printer WIFI module wires to an Arduino?''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM94326USBGP, HP P/N 1150-7924 ==Notes== ===Pinout=== The colors are from the wiring found in a '''HP Officejet Pro 8000''' (2009). :The square pad on the board indicates pin 1. *Red (1) - +Vcc *Orange (2) - + Vcc (5V) *Black (3) - GND *Brown (4) - GND *Green (5) - USBDM (USB data minus) *White (6) - USBDP (USB data plus) *NC (7) - NC *Black (8) - GND ==See also== *[https://electronics.stackexchange.com/questions/94244/how-to-connect-a-printer-wifi-module-wires-to-an-arduino/94246 ''How to connect a Printer WIFI module wires to an Arduino?''] :[[HP SDGOB-0991 (1150-7933)]] HP P/N: 1150-7933 :[[Broadcom]] BCM94319WLUSBN4LPT *[https://electronics.stackexchange.com/questions/64203/can-anyone-locate-specs-on-this-wifi-module ''Can anyone locate specs on this wifi module?''] :[[Canon K30306]] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/AZDK30306 AZDK30306] :[[Marvell]] 88W8388/88W8015 *[http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/Bluetooth_Daughter_Card_(14_pins) Bluetooth Daughter Card] BCM2045B (0a5c:217f) {{SCollapse|lsusb |
$lsusb -v
Bus 001 Device 005: ID 0a5c:217f Broadcom Corp. BCM2045B (BDC-2.1)
Device Descriptor:
  bLength                18
  bDescriptorType         1
  bcdUSB               2.00
  bDeviceClass          224 Wireless
  bDeviceSubClass         1 Radio Frequency
  bDeviceProtocol         1 Bluetooth
  bMaxPacketSize0        64
  idVendor           0x0a5c Broadcom Corp.
  idProduct          0x217f BCM2045B (BDC-2.1)
  bcdDevice            3.60
  iManufacturer           1 
  iProduct                2 
  iSerial                 3 
  bNumConfigurations      1
}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
